title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Seed of
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Seed of 

Oil Plants and Fibre Plants) (Amendment) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (seed oil plant fibre plants) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Communities (Seed of Oil Plants and Fibre Plants)
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Seed of Oil Plants and Fibre Plants) 
Regulations 2003 (S.I. No. 280 of 2003) are amended by substituting in 
Regulation 2(1) for the definition of “EC Directive” (as amended by the 
European Communities (Vegetable Seeds) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. 
No. 201 of 2020)) the following: 

“‘Directive’ means Council Directive 2002/57/EC of 13 June 20022 (as amended 
by Council Directive 2002/68/EC of 19 July 20023, Commission Directive 
2003/45/EC of 28 May 20034, Council Directive 2003/61/EC of 18 June 20035, 
Council Directive 2004/117/EC of 22 December 20046, Commission Directive 
2009/74/EC of 26 June 20097, Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 
2016/11 of 5 January 20168, Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 
2016/317 of 3 March 20169 subject to Commission Regulation (EC) No 
217/2006 of 8 February 200610 as it relates to oil and fibre plants, Commission 
Implementing Directive (EU) 2020/177 of 11 February 2020 and Commission 
Implementing Directive (EU) 2024/3010 of 29th November 2024;”.
text_norm: 2 european community (seed oil plant fibre plants) regulation 2003 (s.i no 280 2003) amended substituting regulation 2(1) definition ec directive (as amended european community (vegetable seeds) (amendment) regulation 2020 (s.i no 201 2020)) following directive mean council directive 2002 57 ec 13 june 20022 (as amended council directive 2002 68 ec 19 july 20023 commission directive 2003 45 ec 28 may 20034 council directive 2003 61 ec 18 june 20035 council directive 2004 117 ec 22 december 20046 commission directive 2009 74 ec 26 june 20097 commission implementing directive (eu) 2016 11 5 january 20168 commission implementing directive (eu) 2016 317 3 march 20169 subject commission regulation (ec) 217 2006 8 february 200610 relates oil fibre plant commission implementing directive (eu) 2020 177 11 february 2020 commission implementing directive (eu) 2024 3010 29th november 2024

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2024/3010 by amending the Directive as they relate to 
inspections for Union regulated non-quarantine pests (RNQPs) and measures 
intended to prevent their presence on seeds of oil and fibre plants for planting. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [140] 5
